Description: Target position of relative movement after capture.Minimum/maximum values depend on:- Scaling factorModified settings become active the next time themotor moves.Available with firmware version ≥V01.10.
Parameter address via fieldbus: CANopen 3023:DhModbus 8986Profibus 8986CIP 135.1.13ModbusTCP 8986EtherCAT 3023:DhPROFINET 8986

Description: Velocity of relative movement after capture.Value 0: Use actual motor velocityValue >0: Value is the target velocityThe adjustable value is internally limited to thesetting in RAMP_v_max.Modified settings become active the next time themotor moves.Available with firmware version ≥V01.10.
Parameter address via fieldbus: CANopen 3023:EhModbus 8988Profibus 8988CIP 135.1.14ModbusTCP 8988EtherCAT 3023:EhPROFINET 8988
